abstract: Streaming service Hulu, grappling to acquire rights for expensive prime-time television series, has found cheaper shows and easy-to-get content in anime and other niche foreign programming; what the stylized form of Japanese animation lacks in mass appeal it makes up for in price.
snippet: Hulu, the streaming Web site, has found cheaper shows and easy-to-get content in anime and other niche foreign programming.
lead_paragraph: Hulu, the streaming Web site, has found cheaper shows and easy-to-get content in anime and other niche foreign programming.

headline.main: Animation Gives an Edge to Streaming Services
headline.print_headline: Animation Gives an Edge to Streaming Services
headline.seo: Hulu and Netflix Gain an Advantage With Anime
